/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. A pink and purple rainbow arcs gracefully across the sky, adding a touch of whimsy to the urban scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Parked cars line the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city.

The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light. The image is a snapshot of life in Beijing, capturing the city's vibrant energy and natural beauty.
